name: Simplebot WWW
description: Delta Chat bot that allows to browse the web, download and upload files, and more, all by email / Delta Chat

ADMIN.description: Your own email address as bot administrator

ADDR.description: The email address of the bot. IMAP access required, for gmail check https://support.google.com/mail/answer/7126229

PASSWORD.description: The password of the bot's email account

DELAY.description: Time(in seconds) to wait between sent file parts
